title: Moist Avocado Bread
ingredients: ['325g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1 teaspoon baking powder', '3/4 teaspoon salt', '3/4 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '3/4 teaspoon ground allspice', '115g unsalted butter, softened', '375g caster sugar', '3 eggs', '350g mashed ripe avocado', '175g buttermilk', '80g pecans, chopped', '80g raisins', '1 tablespoon grated orange zest']
